data.eml:eml: Redescription of Brachyolus punctatus White, 1846 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae), with synonyms and lectotype designations

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brown, Samuel D. J. (2018): Redescription of Brachyolus punctatus White, 1846 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Entiminae), with synonyms and lectotype designations. Zootaxa 4369 (3): 432-442, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4369.3.8
